entry.title: Inside Israel's Effort to Prove a Gaza Hospital Was a Hamas Command Center
entry.content: The Israeli military has stepped up its efforts to prove that Gazaâ€™s largest hospital was a Hamas command center, as the humanitarian fallout from the war heaps pressure on Israel.

entry.title: Israel's Hostage Deal With Hamas Is a Hard-Fought Diplomatic Win but Brings New Risks
entry.content: A pause in fighting could allow the militant group to regroup in southern Gaza, where the civilian population has swelled.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What We Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.
